pr_title: StringMatcher: extract substrings from regexp that any matching text must contain

timeline.message:
StringMatcher: extract substrings from regexp that any matching text must contain

use them to speed up token text matching and regexp rules

timeline.bodyText: This class would be a good candidate for a unit test, wouldn't it?
timeline.author: danielnaber
timeline.diffHunk:

+package org.languagetool.rules.patterns;
+
+import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
+
+import java.util.Arrays;
+
+/**
+ * A list of strings that are expected to occur in a larger string in the given order,
+ * with optional requirements for them to start/end the text.
+ * This class is used to avoid more expensive regular expression matching where possible.
+ */
+class Substrings {

replies.bodyText: It's more of an implementation detail of StringMatcher, extracted to keep it smaller. So most of it is already tested (indirectly) in StringMatcherTest.
replies.author: donnerpeter
